title: Cambridge Analytica - Facebook Fallout: What Does It Mean For You?
subtitle: Fact Vs Fiction: Fake News Of The Week.
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim:
"If you are not the customer, you are the product." Why the latest revelations around Facebook users data being misused for election campaigns should not come as a huge surprise. In Episode - 24 Jency Jacob and Suyash Barve discuss what it means for you and me.

In this video we cover the following story:

Cambridge Analytica – Facebook Fallout: Time For BJP & Congress To Come Clean
